Comment: We also need to see why people are moving away from brick and mortar retail outlets. few reasons are -parking, store opening and closing time, queue for weighing non standard items (e.g. fruits, vegetables, pulses), what is available in store or not , then queue for billing, our own behaviour to keep adding items in cart and so on. Solution could be self checkout addressing this issues. Technology is available,issue is Capex and our own unique behaviour of shopping.  We atJeasia Solutions have a patented solution of self checkoutâ€¦ works with your existing IT setup (with a symbolic modification only), extremely light on capex and recurring costs.
